p: WEPS and EEPS showed a concentration-dependent activity on XO inhibition ( Figure 2(c)). EEPS showed an appreciable inhibition activity on XO (IC 50154.14 ± 4.62 μg/mL), significantly stronger than WEPS ( p < 0.05) which showed a modest activity on XO (IC 501688.07 ± 19.66 μg/mL). However, the observed activity on EEPS is considerably weaker than allopurinol, a reference XO inhibitor, which displayed IC 50 of 5.31 ± 0.49 μg/mL.
